title: Adult Language Proficiency Improvement Program Through Mobile Gamified Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language proficiency and basic smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Non-degree adult learners aiming for language acquisition in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, combining weekly offline workshops with mobile app-based self-directed learning.

learning_goals: Learners will be able to analyze the language learning effectiveness of mobile apps with over 70% accuracy using gamified assessment tools.
Learners will be able to explain the impact of game mechanics (quests, badges, leaderboards) on learning motivation by achieving a weekly goal completion rate of over 85%.

Learners will be able to present three or more case studies demonstrating how gamification elements contribute to improving communication skills in real-world language use scenarios through project-based assessments.

resources: Smartphone-Compatible Gamified Learning Apps (e.g., Memrise, Duolingo)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
